name: SettimoCielo🌤️
description:
Settimo Cielo is a side scrolling Platform game where You are Dead and sent to Heaven, but Saint Peter gave you the chance to come back to Life if you can beat his levels.

The Game is based on the GameDev.Tv project Obstacle Assault with some mods.

It's the first game we try to build. Hope it can give some moments of fun!

Source code available here: https://github.com/questmapping/SettimoCielo
